thread.section_title: Pack Mule Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pack Mule | packmule.com
thread.title: Brian Cella
thread.title_full: Pack Mule reviewed by Brian Cella

author: Brian Cella
title: Brian Cella
text:
At the very last moment of 2016, our company decided to purchase 3 more Pack Mules for different locations - the only catch- they had to arrive before the end of the year. This gave Wesley International about 48 hours to put this all together and get the units on a truck - and somehow they made it happen!
On top of that (we now own 5 Pack Mules) and our people LOVE them! I wish I had known/bought these years ago. They make life easier and SAFER for our staff, and no doubt, more efficient - which our Customers love!
Special Thanks to Gregory Boone and the rest at Wesley that made it all happen exactly as I needed it to!
